name: Fruit Burglar
description:
WASD and Arrowkeys are movement keys. You can choose which you prefer.

Try to be sneaky and steal fruits while the vendor is crouching.

After stealing deliver them to the carpet to get score.

If vendor sees you he will call for Guard to come and get you. 

(Guard spawning was made during a scrunch so he will be just spawned in :D)
